item.title: 蓝猫头鹰联席首席执行官划清公共和私营市场的界限
item.description: Blue Owl Capital Inc. 的联席首席执行官马克-利普舒尔茨（Marc Lipschultz）认为，尽管其他高管呼吁在这个价值 1.7 万亿美元的行业中增加流动性，并声称两者正在融合，但私人市场和公共市场之间仍有区别。【原文：There’s still a distinction between private and public markets, according to Blue Owl Capital Inc.’s co-chief executive officer, Marc Lipschultz, despite calls from other executives for more liquidity in the $1.7 trillion industry and a pitch that the two are converging.】

item.title: 业绩低于华尔街预期，币安股价创 2022 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 美国最大的加密货币交易所 Coinbase Global Inc. 周三晚些时候公布的业绩低于华尔街预期，该公司股价创下两年多来最大跌幅。【原文：Shares of Coinbase Global Inc. fell the most in more than two years after the largest US crypto exchange posted results late Wednesday that were below Wall Street expectations.】

item.title: 苹果在华销售依然是本季度业绩的薄弱环节
item.description: 世界上最有价值的公司苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Apple Inc., the world’s most valuable company, reported weaker sales in China than anticipated last quarter, raising fresh concerns about one of its most important regions.】

item.title: 亚马逊预计假日购物季销售和利润强劲
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）预计本季度的利润和收入将超过分析师的预期，原因是人们对假日购物旺季持乐观态度。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. projected profit and revenue in the current quarter that exceeded analysts’ estimates on optimism for a strong holiday shopping season.】

item.title: 稳定币发行商 Tether 称第三季度利润为 25 亿美元
item.description: 英属维尔京群岛注册成立的最大稳定币运营商 Tether 控股有限公司表示，该公司第三季度实现净利润 25 亿美元，主要得益于持有美国国债和黄金所实现的收益。【原文：Tether Holdings Ltd., the British Virgin Islands-incorporated operator of the largest stablecoin, said it posted net profit of $2.5 billion in the third quarter, largely driven by gains realized on its holdings of US Treasuries and gold.】

item.title: 英特尔业绩引发扭亏为盈乐观情绪后大涨
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）发布的第四季度营收预期略高于预期，引发了市场对其有能力夺回部分失去的市场份额的乐观情绪。股价大涨。【原文：Intel Corp. gave a fourth-quarter revenue forecast slightly above estimates, sparking optimism that it’s capable of reclaiming some lost market share. Shares surged.】

item.title: 鲜为人知的 OpenAI 竞争对手正试图赢得全球南方市场
item.description:
G42的Inception公司在美国相对默默无闻，但它拥有大量的资金和筹码。【原文：

G42’s Inception is relatively unknown in the US, but it has access to a vast amount of capital and chips.

】

item.title: 星巴克首席执行官的 "可实现 "愿景引发华尔街谨慎乐观情绪
item.description: 星巴克公司新老板布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）的扭亏为盈演讲涉及从夏普到豆奶的方方面面，华尔街大多很喜欢他的演讲。【原文：The turnaround pitch from Starbucks Corp.’s new boss Brian Niccol touched on everything from Sharpies to soy milk, and Wall Street mostly liked what it saw.】

item.title: 里德-霍夫曼认为 2024 年大选的愤怒会扰乱硅谷
item.description: 亿万富翁、风险投资家里德-霍夫曼（Reid Hoffman）是卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）反对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）竞选活动的高调支持者。【原文：Billionaire venture capitalist Reid Hoffman, a high-profile supporter of Kamala Harris’s campaign against Donald Trump, said that division in Silicon Valley has interfered with business during the contentious 2024 election cycle.】

item.title: 电动飞机初创公司 Beta 新一轮融资 3.18 亿美元
item.description: 电动航空航天初创企业贝塔科技公司（Beta Technologies Inc.【原文：Electric aerospace startup Beta Technologies Inc. raised $318 million from investors to fund the production of aircraft that can takeoff and land vertically.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚将主要利率降至 9.75%，财政风险令市场恐慌
item.description: 在决策者权衡财政风险之际，哥伦比亚央行无视加快降息步伐的压力，比索因此跌至一年多来的最弱水平。【原文：Colombia’s central bank ignored pressure to accelerate the pace of interest rate cuts as policymakers weigh fiscal risks that sent the peso to its weakest level in more than a year.】

item.title: 加拿大天然气公司和 Cenovus 公司在价格疲软的情况下减少天然气钻探
item.description: 加拿大自然资源有限公司（Canadian Natural Resources Ltd. ）和Cenovus能源公司（Cenovus Energy Inc.【原文：Canadian Natural Resources Ltd. and Cenovus Energy Inc., two of the country’s largest energy companies, are cutting back on gas drilling as prices for the fuel languish.】

item.title: 万达以 1.6 亿英镑出售詹姆斯-邦德的游艇制造商
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，大连万达集团股份有限公司（Dalian Wanda Group Co., Ltd.）下属的一家实体正在向狮心资本（Lionheart Capital）和东方资本合伙公司（Orienta Capital Partners）出售一家游艇制造商，售价约为1.6亿英镑（约合2.06亿美元），约为这家中国企业集团十多年前支付价格的一半。【原文：An entity affiliated with Dalian Wanda Group Co. is selling a yachtmaker whose boats were featured in James Bond movies to Lionheart Capital and Orienta Capital Partners for about £160 million ($206 million), roughly half of what the Chinese conglomerate paid more than a decade ago, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纳斯达克和 Cboe 就更新后的股票交易规则挑战美国证券交易委员会
item.description: 纳斯达克公司（Nasdaq Inc）和 Cboe 全球市场公司（Cboe Global Markets Inc）这两家最大的证券交易所对美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）改变股票交易经济结构的新规定提出了质疑。【原文：Nasdaq Inc. and Cboe Global Markets Inc., two of the biggest stock exchanges, challenged a new US Securities and Exchange Commission rule that changes the economic structure of how stocks trade.】

item.title: 认识托尼-欣奇克里夫--这位搞砸了特朗普纽约集会的喜剧演员和播客
item.description:
这位在乔-罗根喜剧俱乐部主持每周播客的辱华喜剧演员说 他搬到奥斯汀是为了  "更好的高尔夫 "和 "更好的人"

。【原文：

The insult comic, who hosts a popular weekly podcast at Joe Rogan’s comedy club, said he moved to Austin for ‘better golf’ and ‘better people’

】

item.title: 欧尔班引发担忧：他计划给欧盟领导人一个特朗普惊喜
item.description: 维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）周四与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）通了电话，这引起了一些欧盟官员的担忧，他们认为匈牙利总理可能计划邀请特朗普参加即将举行的欧盟会议，如果他赢得下周的美国大选的话。【原文：Viktor Orban held a phone call with Donald Trump on Thursday, raising concerns among some European Union officials that the Hungarian premier may be planning to invite him to dial into an upcoming EU meeting should he win next week’s US election.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州铁路公司 Brightline 风险最高的小额贷款吸引投资者押注扩张
item.description: 债券投资者正在抢购 Brightline 风险最高的一大笔债务，这是对这家私营铁路公司在佛罗里达州向西扩张的赌注。【原文：Bond investors are snapping up the riskiest chunk of Brightline’s debt in a wager on the private railroad as it expands west across Florida.】

item.title: 新加坡、加拿大基金酝酿支持 18 亿美元资产大洗牌
item.description: 加拿大最大的养老基金和新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte）正在进行深入谈判，以支持 PSG Equity 将 18 亿美元的公司股权转移到专为此类资产转移设计的新工具中的计划。【原文：Canada’s largest pension fund and Singapore’s GIC Pte are in advanced talks to back PSG Equity’s plan to transfer $1.8 billion of company stakes into a new vehicle designed specifically for this type of asset-shifting.】

item.title: 凯勒-萨特称瑞银资本水平取决于解决计划
item.description: 瑞士财政部长卡琳-凯勒-萨特（Karin Keller-Sutter）表示，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）必须为其海外分支机构维持的额外资本水平在很大程度上取决于该银行对紧急情况的准备程度。【原文：Swiss Finance Minister Karin Keller-Sutter said that the level of extra capital that UBS Group AG will have to maintain against its foreign units depends largely on how well the bank prepares for an emergency scenario.】

item.title: 汽车保险公司实现首次盈利后，Root 在有史以来最好的一天飙升 192
item.description: 汽车保险平台 Root Inc. 宣布实现历史上首次盈利后，其股价在周四迎来了有史以来最好的一天。【原文：Root Inc. shares are having their best day ever on Thursday after the auto insurance platform announced that it had turned profitable for the first time in its history.】

item.title: 埃克森同意向 Pluspetrol 出售阿根廷页岩油资产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，埃克森美孚公司已同意将其在阿根廷瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩区的大部分资产出售给 Pluspetrol SA 公司。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. has agreed to sell most of its assets in Argentina’s Vaca Muerta shale patch to Pluspetrol SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气买家接近达成阿塞拜疆协议以维持乌克兰天然气供应
item.description: 欧洲买家即将与阿塞拜疆达成一项商业协议，以便在俄罗斯与乌克兰之间的过境协议于今年年底到期后，继续向欧洲大陆输送天然气。【原文：European buyers are nearing a commercial agreement with Azerbaijan to keep natural gas flowing to the continent after a transit deal between Russia and Ukraine expires at the end of the year.】

item.title: OpenAI 为 ChatGPT 带来搜索功能，向谷歌发起挑战
item.description:
新选项将使聊天机器人的用户能够像在网络上一样及时搜索信息。【原文：

The new option will let the chatbot’s users search for timely information much as they would on the web.

】

item.title: 匈牙利欧尔班面临福林疲软和经济脆弱的两难选择
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）面临着一个难题，即如何使他的国家走出衰退，因为货币疲软限制了货币和预算刺激措施的范围。【原文：Hungary’s Prime Minister Viktor Orban faces a conundrum how to bring his country out of a recession as the weakening currency limits the scope for monetary and budget stimulus.】

item.title: 房贷利率连续第五周上涨，30 年期房贷利率达到 6.72
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第五周上升。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US rose for the fifth week in a row.】

item.title: 微策略公司 210 亿美元股权计划创下特斯拉最高纪录
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.）计划出售创纪录的 210 亿美元新股，以增加其比特币储备，从而开启了一个将远远超过埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.）四年前设定的里程碑的计划。【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. laid out plans to sell a record $21 billion in new shares to add to its stockpile of Bitcoin, opening the door to a program that would far surpass the milestone Elon Musk’s Tesla Inc. set about four years ago.】

item.title: Kraken公司任命Dapper公司的Stephanie Lemmerman为首席财务官，以应对人事变动
item.description: Kraken 任命斯蒂芬妮-莱默曼（Stephanie Lemmerman）为首席财务官，这是美国加密货币交易所本周宣布的大范围重组中最新的一次高管调整。【原文：Kraken named Stephanie Lemmerman as chief financial officer, the latest executive suite reshuffling by the US crypto exchange as part of wide-ranging restructuring announced this week.】

item.title: Alphabet 为谷歌地图添加人工智能，抵御苹果等后起之秀
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司宣布为其两款地图应用程序增加新功能，这是该搜索巨头利用双子座人工智能模型改造产品的持续努力的一部分。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google announced new features for its two mapping apps, part of the search giant’s ongoing effort to revamp products with its Gemini artificial intelligence models.】

item.title: 陷入困境的兼并公司在美国大选中看到了交易催化剂
item.description: 美国大选让华尔街的许多人目不转睛。对于兼并套利交易商来说，选举结果事关重大，也是他们重振颓势的机会。【原文：The US election has much of Wall Street riveted. For merger-arbitrage traders, there’s a lot riding on the outcome, and a chance to revive their sagging fortunes.】

item.title: 审计员辞职后，超微 2024 年股价转为负值
item.description: 超级微电脑公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. shares turned negative for the year on Thursday, as cascading concerns about the server maker’s finances continued to weigh on the stock.】
